C

cabSquare - Class in boardrelated
This class as the sub-type of buyableSquares allows us progress in a manner that the users can buy cab squares and in addition to that build some stands.
cabSquare(String, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class boardrelated.cabSquare
 
CabSquareDialog() - Static method in class backend.DialogGenerator
This dialogs pops up when a player lands on a Cab Square.
canBuild() - Method in class boardrelated.cabSquare
Lets caller know if the owner can build a stand on it.
canBuild(int) - Method in class boardrelated.deedSquare
This method checks if a player can build on a deedSquare.
canBuild() - Method in class boardrelated.RailroadTrackSquare
Once a player has a railroad, this procedure lets know if the player can add a depot on it
canBuyCurrentSquare() - Method in class backend.Player
Checks that the square the player on is buyable and it has not any owner.
canRemove(int) - Method in class boardrelated.cabSquare
Lets caller know if the owner can remove a stand or remove directly the land.
canRemove(int) - Method in class boardrelated.deedSquare
This method decreases the structure level of a deedSquare by 1.
canRemove(int) - Method in class boardrelated.RailroadTrackSquare
This procedure allows us to know if we can remove the property or the depot. or neither
canRemove(int) - Method in class boardrelated.utilitySquare
This only constructor of utilitySquares provides the creation of instances of utility squares.
Card - Class in card
This Class is a class that simply holds the fields String cardName, Player owner, int cardID, int typeID and boolean keepable for the instance of the class and has constructors, setters and getters for the fields specified above.

checkBankrupcy(int, Player, Game) - Method in class backend.Player

Checks the faces of the dices and updates the states.
checkTheJailDice() - Method in class backend.Dice
Returns true if the rolled 2 dice have same value.
colorListForHurricane(int) - Method in class boardrelated.Board
This method method, when called, destroyes the highest level of constructions in a color group.
